name: AI-Powered Email Responder
description: Built a full-stack email management platform with Gmail OAuth2 to sync and manage multiple inboxes in one interface.
Added AI-powered email reply generation, producing personalized responses using a Groq-hosted OpenAI-compatible LLM.
Implemented a Redis-backed background job queue for Gmail sync + AI inference, improving performance by ~30%.
Developed a scalable Express + Prisma backend with optimized queries and structured logging (Winston).

name: Fitness Tracker Web App
description: Built a full-stack fitness tracking web app (React-Vite, Express, MySQL) with real-time data visualization.
Implemented secure auth using bcrypt and JWT.
Optimized database performance via connection pooling and query tuning for faster load times.
Deployed via Railway CI/CD with automated container builds.

name: Emergency Reporting Web App
description: Built a web-based emergency reporting system using React + TypeScript + Bootstrap with Leaflet maps, allowing users to log incidents with location markers and details.
Implemented secure passcode-based access using MD5 hashing and DOM Storage for protected report updates and deletions.
Enhanced usability with sortable report lists and interactive map markers that dynamically adjust based on zoom levels.
